snippet.title: EvoCreo Release Trailer
snippet.description:
EvoCreo takes place in the world of Zenith, a world populated with monsters called Creos. You find out that his father, a legendary EvoCreo,  has been missing for days after investigating an organization called Shadow Hive. You travel the world looking for clues on the whereabouts of  your father while also trying to live up to his legacy. 

The game is being developed for Android, iOS, and OUYA. This iOS and OUYA versions are set to release on May 7th with the Android version set to come out within a few weeks.

A more thorough description of the game and its systems can be found on our Kickstarter page: http://kck.st/1fzYqvL

Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/ilmfinity

or follow us on twitter: https://twitter.com/ilmfinity
